ygData.subject: RE: Clarity and song/spell stacking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Incredible slowdown effect.  I mean to the tune of hundreds of percent slower.  I d say an ice giant normally would double attack every 2 secs or so.  With
ygData.messageBody:
> How much of a slowdown did the shaman spell have? I've been
> watching for this when an enchanter friend cast a slowdown on
> a mob we were fighting. Her spell was a much greater slowdown
> than Chain would've caused, and based on my eyeball
> observations (combat was too hectic to use a stopwatch) Chain
> didn't override the spell.

Incredible slowdown effect. I mean to the tune of hundreds
of percent slower. I'd say an ice giant normally would double
attack every 2 secs or so. With L49 drowsy, the ice giant would
only swing every 6-8 secs. It's that much of a slowdown. But
as soon as I chained it, it started wailing on me again fast.

Harmonic.
